name: Last Train Home (Arseny_Gar)
description:
Press Left Mouse Button to shoot

A/D - move Left/Right

Humankind discovered this lifeless planet 10 cycles ago. It was too late when we figured out that we are only guests here.  One day they started flying out from their hidden lairs. The beasts had no mercy on us. Evacuation was declared. 

We are workers and engineers of the Wilder Sang mine. We have no weapons, but our will is strong. The freight train locomotive is our only chance to reach the evacuation point. This is the last train home.
